statements: SELECT * FROM biometric_payment_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT biometric_data, payment_amount FROM biometric_payment_data WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, payment_amount FROM biometric_payment_data WHERE biometric_data LIKE '%finger%';
SELECT * FROM biometric_payment_data ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM biometric_payment_data WHERE last_accessed > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, biometric_data FROM biometric_payment_data WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY last_accessed DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM biometric_payment_data WHERE access_level = 'admin' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, payment_amount, access_level FROM biometric_payment_data WHERE access_level = 'user' AND payment_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT biometric_data, user_id, access_level FROM biometric_payment_data WHERE last_accessed >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_accessed ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT user_id, biometric_data, payment_amount, access_level, last_accessed FROM biometric_payment_data WHERE biometric_data LIKE '%fingerprint%' OR biometric_data LIKE '%retina%' ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM biometric_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT biometric_type, created_at FROM biometric_data WHERE biometric_type = 'fingerprint';
SELECT id, access_level, permission FROM access_control WHERE role = 'admin' AND permission = 'write';
SELECT user_id, role FROM access_control WHERE access_level > 3 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, role FROM access_control WHERE user_id = 5 AND role LIKE '%manager%';
SELECT * FROM biometric_data ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, biometric_type FROM biometric_data WHERE biometric_type = 'fingerprint'
SELECT user_id, biometric_type, created_at FROM biometric_data WHERE user_id = 123 AND biometric_type = 'face_recognition' ORDER BY created_at ASC
SELECT access_level, role, permission FROM access_control WHERE access_level > 5 AND role = 'admin'
SELECT id, user_id, role, access_level, permission FROM access_control WHERE permission LIKE '%read%' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM biometric_users;
SELECT id, username FROM biometric_users;
SELECT permission_level FROM access_control;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_amount FROM payment_data;
SELECT username, biometric_data FROM biometric_users;
SELECT * FROM biometric_users;
SELECT id, username FROM biometric_users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, COUNT(*) AS num_users FROM biometric_users GROUP BY username;
SELECT b.username, p.payment_amount FROM biometric_users b JOIN payment_data p ON b.id = p.user_id;
SELECT b.username, a.permission_level FROM biometric_users b JOIN access_control a ON b.id = a.user_id WHERE a.permission_level = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM BiometricData;
SELECT user_id, biometric_data FROM BiometricData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT access_level FROM UserAccessControl;
SELECT log_id, event_type, event_description FROM SecurityLogs WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT role_id, permission_level, description FROM RolePermissions ORDER BY role_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM BiometricData WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM BiometricData WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT biometric_data, timestamp FROM BiometricData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-06-01' LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM UserAccessControl WHERE last_login IS NOT NULL AND access_level IN ('Admin', 'Manager') ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT role_id, permission_level, description FROM RolePermissions WHERE role_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM biometric_data;
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM biometric_data WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT facial_data, fingerprint_data FROM biometric_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT access_logs.log_id, access_logs.log_time, biometric_data.facial_data FROM access_logs JOIN biometric_data ON access_logs.user_id = biometric_data.user_id;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM user_authentication JOIN user_roles ON user_authentication.role_id = user_roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM biometric_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT fingerprint_data, facial_data FROM biometric_data WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT log_time, action_taken FROM access_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT role_name, permission_name FROM user_roles JOIN role_permissions ON user_roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM user_authentication WHERE role_id = (SELECT role_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'Manager');
